Westmere’s Meola, Garnet Rds roundabout to get traffic light: Locals irate at extra changes as wider works wind down https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westmeres-meola-garnet-rds-roundabout-to-get-traffic-light-locals-irate-at-extra-changes-as-wider-works-wind-下/WPQBJIPNYNADDLBZMU536UYWNE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westmeres-meola-garnet-rds-roundabout-to-get-traffic-light-locals-irate-at-extra-changes-as-wider-works-wind-下/WPQBJIPNYNADDLBZMU536UYWNE/ Raphael FranksAuckland Transport is installing traffic lights at the Meola Rd/Garnet Rd roundabout. Photo / Alex Burton
